anya-e0810n0:3: Yassa ñāṇaṁ sadā ñāṇaṁ, nāññeyyā ñāṇakaṁ vinā;
anya-e0810n0:8_0: [Ka] idhāyaṁ ganthakāro paṭhamamattano paresampi sammā hitatthanipphādanatthaṁ puññasampada’mācinoti
anya-e0810n0:8_1: ‘‘tathāgato’’ccādinā. Tattha karuṇākaro mahākaruṇāya uppattiṭṭhānabhūto yo tathāgato
anya-e0810n0:8_2: bhagavā karopayātaṁ attano hatthagataṁ sukhappadaṁ sukhassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ sukhakāraṇaṁ
anya-e0810n0:8_3: vā sukhadāyakaṁ vā padaṁ nibbānaṁ osajja cajitvā kalisambhave dukkhakāraṇabhūte bhave
anya-e0810n0:8_5: karaṁ karonto paratthaṁ paresamatthaṁyeva akā katavā, tamedisaṁ tathāgataṁ ahaṁ namāmi.
anya-e0810n0:9_0: [Kha] yañca dhammaṁ jarārujādimuttā jarārogādīhi vimuttā munikuñjarā muniseṭṭhā bhagavanto
anya-e0810n0:9_1: apūjayuṁ pūjitavanto, tathā uttare uttame sattānaṁ vā saṁsāramahoghapakkhandānaṁ
anya-e0810n0:9_2: tato uttaraṇasamatthe yahiṁ tare yasmiṁ dhammaplave ṭhitā sammāpaṭipajjanavasena
anya-e0810n0:9_3: ārūḷhā narānarā manussā ca devā ca tivaṭṭambunidhiṁ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0810n0:9_4: tīhi vaṭṭehi ākulitaṁ saṁsāramahamburāsiṁ tariṁsu tiṇṇā, aghappahaṁ kilesappahānakaraṁ,
anya-e0810n0:9_5: saṁsāradukkhappahānakaraṁ vā taṁ dhammamapi ahaṁ namāmi.
anya-e0810n0:10_1: munindassa orasaputtabhāvaṁ gataṁ pattaṁ nutaṁ kilesakhepanakaṁ supuññakhettaṁ puññatthikānaṁ
anya-e0810n0:10_2: puññabījaviruhanaṭṭhānaṁ sukhettabhūtaṁ bhuvane loke sutaṁ vissutaṁ , sutadharaṁ
anya-e0810n0:10_3: vā kilesasavanābhāvena assutaṁ apāṇopi pāṇo karīyitthāti pāṇīkato, pātimokkhasaṁvaro,
anya-e0810n0:10_4: sova saṁvaro etassatthīti pāṇīkatasaṁvaro, taṁ pāṇīkatasaṁvaraṁ, varaṁ sīlādiguṇehi
anya-e0810n0:10_5: sadevakehi lokehi patthanīyaṁ. ‘‘Devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino’’ti udā. 27 hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0810n0:10_6: Sadā sabbasmiṁ kāle guṇoghena sīlādiguṇasamūhena nirantarantaraṁ avicchinnamānasaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:10_7: paripuṇṇacittaṁ vā gaṇampi aṭṭhannaṁ ariyapuggalānaṁ samūhaṁ api ahaṁ namāmīti evamettha
anya-e0810n0:11_1: Buddhādīnamabhidhānānaṁ sarūpavasena, liṅgavasena ca paridīpanato pakāsanato ‘‘abhidhānappadīpika’’nti
anya-e0810n0:11_2: laddhanāmaṁ satthaṁ pakāsissaṁ antobhāvena nipphannaṁ bahibhāvena pakāsissaṁ. Antobhāvassa
anya-e0810n0:11_3: hi bahibhāvamapekkhitvā bhāvitamupapannaṁ. Nanu santeva pubbācariyānaṁ nāmaliṅgappakāsanānyamarakosatikaṇḍoppalinyādyabhidhānasatthāni,
anya-e0810n0:11_4: pāṇini byāḍivararucicandagomi ruddavāmanādivihitāni ca liṅgasatthāni, tato kimidamuccate
anya-e0810n0:11_5: iccāha ‘‘nāmaliṅgāni buddhabhāsitassārahāni dassayanto’’ti. Etena santesvapi pubbācariyānaṁ
anya-e0810n0:11_6: satthesu yasmā na tesu nāmaliṅgāni buddhavacanānurūpāni honti , tasmā tadanurūpāni
anya-e0810n0:11_7: nāmaliṅgāni dassayanto abhidhānasatthaṁ pakāsissāmīti etamatthaṁ dīpeti. Namyate
anya-e0810n0:11_8: abhidhīyate attho anenāti nāmaṁ, saddasatthe namudhātuvasena. Liṅgayate ‘‘itthiyamato
anya-e0810n0:11_9: āpaccayo’’tyādinā vibhajjateti, itthādayo vānena liṅgīyante byañjīyanteti liṅgaṁ,
anya-e0810n0:11_10: itthipumanapuṁsakaṁ. Kimetassa abhidhānasatthassa karaṇe payojananti pucchāyaṁ yasmiṁ
anya-e0810n0:11_11: sati taṁ sotāro sotumussahanti, taṁ dassetumāha ‘‘nāmaliṅgesvi’’ccādi. Yato buddhavacane
anya-e0810n0:11_12: paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṁ, tadeva attho payojanaṁ, taṁ icchantīti pāṭavatthino, tesaṁ
anya-e0810n0:11_13: pāṭavatthīnaṁ sotūnaṁ nāmaliṅgesu kosallaṁ kusalatā chekabhāvo buddhavacane mahabbalaṁ
anya-e0810n0:11_14: atthassa nicchayakāraṇaṁ hoti, ato tasmā kāraṇā buddhabhāsitassārahāni nāmaliṅgāni
anya-e0810n0:12_0: [Ca] idāni satthalahubhāvatthamāha ‘‘bhiyyo’’ccādi. Bhiyyo bāhullena rūpantarā rūpabhedena
anya-e0810n0:12_1: itthipaccayapumbhāvādikāriyakatena thīpunnapuṁsakaṁ ñeyyaṁ, so ca nāmānaṁ nāmavisesanassa,
anya-e0810n0:12_2: nāmaparāmasisabbanāmasaddassa ca ñeyyo pakārantarābhāvā. Tatra nāmānaṁ rūpabhedo
anya-e0810n0:12_3: yathā – churikā satya’siputti abhidhāna 392 gāthā. Asi khaggo ca sāyako abhidhāna
anya-e0810n0:12_4: 391 gāthā. Pānīyaṁ salilaṁ dakanti abhidhāna 661 gāthā. Nāmavisesanassa yathā – nisītho
anya-e0810n0:12_5: majjhimā rattīti abhidhāna 70 gāthā. Nāmaparāmasisabbanāmasaddassa yathā – ākaṅkhā
anya-e0810n0:12_6: ruci vuttā sā, tvadhikā lālasā dvisūti abhidhāna 163 gāthā. Sāhacariyena niyataliṅgenāvippayogato
anya-e0810n0:12_7: thīpunnapuṁsakaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Katthacīti yatra rūpabhedo natthi, taṁ yathā – marīci migataṇhikā
anya-e0810n0:12_8: abhidhāna 65 gāthā. Raṁsimā bhākaro bhānu abhidhāna 63 gāthā. Āpo payo jalaṁ vāri
anya-e0810n0:12_9: abhidhāna 661 gāthā. Marījhādayo hyabhinnarūpattā liṅgantarepi sambhāviyantehi niyataliṅgehi
anya-e0810n0:12_11: itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ visesetvā kathanena thīpunnapuṁsakaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Kvacīti yatra
anya-e0810n0:12_12: na rūpabhedo liṅganiṇṇayassa nimittaṁ, na ca sāhacariyaṁ liṅgabhedobhimato, nekameva
anya-e0810n0:12_13: vā liṅgamicchate, taṁ yathā – vallarī mañjarī nārī abhidhāna 550 gāthā. Viṭapo viṭabhītthiyaṁ
anya-e0810n0:12_14: abhidhāna 547 gāthā. Bhītitthī bhayamuttāso abhidhāna 166 gāthā. Vajiraṁ punnapuṁsakeccādi abhidhāna 24 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:13_0: [Cha] idāni rūpabhedoti liṅganiṇṇayassa paṭipattihetuko yo bhinnaliṅgānaṁ dvando,
anya-e0810n0:13_2: Abhinnaliṅgīnaṁyeva nāmānaṁ dvando kato, na bhinnaliṅgīnaṁ, yathā – vimutyasaṅkhatadhātu,
anya-e0810n0:13_3: suddhinibbutiyo siyunti abhidhāna 9 gāthā. Na kevalaṁ dvandoyeva, atha kho ekasesopyabhinnaliṅgānaṁyeva
anya-e0810n0:13_4: kato, yathā – naggo digambarāvatthā. abhidhāna 734 gāthāSabbadharakate pana ‘‘jīmūtā
anya-e0810n0:13_5: meghapabbatā’’ iccudāhaṭaṁ. Nanu ca bhinnaliṅgānampi ekaseso kato, yathā – mātā pitā
anya-e0810n0:13_6: tu pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro abhidhāna 249 gāthā. Sasurā sassu sasurā, bhātubhagini
anya-e0810n0:13_7: bhātaroti abhidhāna 250 gāthā. Ettha hi mātā ca pitā ca pitaro, putto ca dhītā ca
anya-e0810n0:13_8: puttā, sassu ca sasuro ca sasurā, bhātā ca bhaginī ca bhātaroti bhinnaliṅgānampi
anya-e0810n0:13_9: ekaseso dassitoti. Ṭhānantare tesaṁ bhinnaliṅgatāya dassitattā na doso. Tāto tu janako
anya-e0810n0:13_10: pitā abhidhāna 243 gāthā. Ammā’mbā jananī mātā abhidhāna 244 gāthā. Apaccaṁ puttotrajo
anya-e0810n0:13_11: suto abhidhāna 240 gāthā. Nāriyaṁ duhitā dhītā abhidhāna 241 gāthā. Jāyāpatīnaṁ jananī,
anya-e0810n0:13_12: sassu vuttātha tappitā. Sasuroti iccādikañhi tesaṁ abhidhāna 246 gāthā ṭhānantaranti.
anya-e0810n0:13_13: Tathā ettha kamaṁ vinā bhinnaliṅgānaṁ gaṇanapāṭho viya saṅkaropi na kato. Tatra hi
anya-e0810n0:13_14: saggadisādayo atthā yathākkamaṁ taṁsambandhā ca sakkavidisādayo atthā sakasakasambandhasahitā
anya-e0810n0:13_15: yathābhidhānaṁ sarūpapaṭipatyamatthabhidheyyā, tathā tappariyāyasambandhāni ca yāni
anya-e0810n0:13_16: nāmāni, tāni sabbāni tadabhidhānāvasare abhidheyyānīti sukhenekatreva sakalanāmapaṭipatti
anya-e0810n0:13_17: sarūpapaṭipatti ca yathā siyāticcetadatthaṁ kamo abhyupagamyate, tathā ca satyāvassaṁ
anya-e0810n0:13_18: saggādipariyāye divasaddādayo, harādyavasare kumārādayo abhidheyyā iti kamānurodhena
anya-e0810n0:13_19: liṅgasaṅkaro pariharitumasakkuṇeyyo, yathāvuttantu kamaṁ vinā neha saṅkaro kato,
anya-e0810n0:13_20: iti pariyāyena itthippakaraṇādikkamena yathāsambhavamabhidhānato, taṁ yathā – īti
anya-e0810n0:13_21: tvitthī ajaññañca, upasaggo upaddavoti abhidhāna 401 gāthā. Atra hi ye tiliṅgā, te
anya-e0810n0:13_22: tiliṅgāvasare eva nibaddhā, na gaṇanapāṭhā viya uccāraṇavasena, evaṁ sabbatra yathāsambhavaṁ nīyate. Vuttañca –
anya-e0810n0:16_1: Gāthāpādantamajjhaṭṭhā gāthānaṁ pādānañca antamajjhaṭṭhā liṅgavācakā anekatthaliṅgavācakāni
anya-e0810n0:16_2: ñāṇadassanādīni liṅgāni pubbamatthaṁ vācakavasena yanti gacchanti. Apare gāthāpādānamādiṭṭhā
anya-e0810n0:16_3: liṅgavācakā paramatthaṁ yanti gacchanti. Taṁ yathā –
anya-e0810n0:21: Khagge kurūre nettiṁso, parasmiñcātra tīsvamuabhidhāna 1089 gāthā;
anya-e0810n0:22: Kusale sukataṁ suṭṭhu-kate ca sukato tisu abhidhāna 938 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:23: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0810n0:24: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābhadiṭṭhisu abhidhāna 778 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:28: Daḷhatthenatireke cā-navasesamhi taṁ tisu abhidhāna 786 gāthā.
anya-e0810n0:30: Jaḷe thūlo mahatyapi abhidhāna 1066 gāthā ccādīsu
anya-e0810n0:31_1: ‘‘pubbaṁ yantī’’ti idaṁ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā gāthānaṁ majjhantaṭṭhā
anya-e0810n0:31_2: pubbaṁ yanti, gāthāmajjhaṭṭhā, pādantamajjhaṭṭhā ca pubbāparañca yantīti yathālābhayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0810n0:32_1: Pumitthiyaṁ ‘‘dvīsū’’ti padaṁ ñeyyaṁ, yathā – asani dvīsu abhidhāna 24 gāthā. Sabbaliṅge
anya-e0810n0:32_2: liṅgattaye ‘‘tīsū’’ti padaṁ ñeyyaṁ, yathā – sattannaṁ pūraṇe seṭṭhe’tisante sattamo
anya-e0810n0:32_3: tisu abhidhāna 942 gāthā. Ettha ca nisiddhaliṅganāmaṁ pārisesato ‘‘sesaliṅga’’nti
anya-e0810n0:32_4: ñeyyaṁ nisiddhaliṅga sesatthaṁ (amara 1.5.), yathā – vassa saṁvaccharā nitthīti abhidhāna
anya-e0810n0:33_1: Abhidhānantarassa aññassa abhidhānassa ārambhe sati, tu anto yassa abhidhānassa,
anya-e0810n0:33_2: atha ādi yassa abhidhānassāti idaṁ abhidhānadvayañca ñeyyaṁ. Tvantamathādikaṁ nāmādipadaṁ
anya-e0810n0:33_3: pubbena na sambajjhateti bhāvo. Tatra nāmapadaṁ yathā – jino sakko tu siddhattho
anya-e0810n0:33_4: abhidhāna 4 gāthā. Kesavo cakkapāṇyatha abhidhāna 16 gāthā. Mahissaro sivo sūlī abhidhāna
anya-e0810n0:33_5: 16 gāthā. Liṅgapadaṁ yathā – pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi abhidhāna 277 gāthā. Pume tūtu
anya-e0810n0:33_6: rajo pupphaṁ abhidhāna 238 gāthā. Sā tirokaraṇīpyatha abhidhāna 298 gāthā. Punnapuṁsakamullocaṁ
anya-e0810n0:33_7: abhidhāna 299 gāthā. Atthapadaṁ yathā – udare tu tathā pācā’nalasmiṁ gahaṇītthiyaṁ
anya-e0810n0:33_8: abhidhāna 973 gāthā. Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihitepyatha. Añjase visikhāyañca,
anya-e0810n0:33_9: pantiyaṁ vīthi nāriyaṁ abhidhāna 940 gāthā. Athasaddena catra anantariyatthena sakapariyāyopalakkhaṇato
anya-e0810n0:33_10: atho saddādīsu ca na pubbena sambajjhate. Pāṇako cāpyatho uccāliṅgo lomasapāṇakoti
anya-e0810n0:34_0: [Jha] idāni buddhavacanānamanurūpānampi pacurappayogānameva kesañci gahaṇaṁ attano
anya-e0810n0:34_2: Sogate sugatassa vacanabhūte āgame piṭakattaye, tañhi āgacchanti tividhasampattiyo
anya-e0810n0:34_3: etenāti āgamoti vuccati. Tasmiṁ bhiyyo payogaṁ bāhullena payujjateti payogo, taṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_4: āgamma gahetvā kvaci araññavaggādīsu nighaṇṭuyuttiñca nighaṇṭunāmake satthe āgataṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_5: buddhavacanānurūpaṁ yuttiñca ānīya ānetvā nāmaliṅgaṁ kathīyati antobhāvena nipphannaṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_6: bahibhāvena pakāsīyate. Āvibhāvattameva hi jaññattaṁ santakāriyakārino. Āsīsāyaṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_7: vā avassambhāvinopi vacanassa vattamānatthavatticchāya vattamānattaṁ, tathā hi loke
anya-e0810n0:34_8: avassambhāvino siddhimabhisandhāya bhāvinamappattaṁ vattamānattena vā atītattena
anya-e0810n0:34_9: vā vattumicchati, taṁ yathā – ‘‘idaṁ mamamapāpaye’’ti koci kenacābhihito santo avassaṁ
anya-e0810n0:34_10: taṁ bhavissatīti maññamāno pāpiyamānaṁ pattaṁ vā vattumicchati , tatoyeva ‘‘āsīsāyaṁ
